text: Steven Daniel Hendrickson (August 30, 1966 â€“ January 8, 2021) was a professional American football linebacker in the National Football League. He was born in Richmond, California. He played for San Francisco 49ers (1989), Dallas Cowboys (1989), San Diego Chargers (1990 to 1994), Houston Oilers (1995) and Philadelphia Eagles (1995). Hendrickson died on January 8, 2021, at his home in Nampa, Idaho at the age of 54. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football linebackers Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Tennessee Titans players Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:Sportspeople from California Category:Sportspeople from Idaho
title: Steve Hendrickson
